title: Doled out

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Unemployed - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Unemployed youth
description: A film about being unemployed and on the dole in Australia in 1978. In interviews and short dramatised sketches, the causes and effects of unemployment are examined in statements by people who are tired of being called "bludgers". Suitable for secondary and tertiary levels.
